alert.note: Alert for Adams; Juneau; Monroe; Trempealeau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 26 at 4:13AM CST until February 27 at 12:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Freezing Rain, Snow Overnight Through Monday... .A potent, quick moving storm system will bring freezing rain and snow to the region overnight through the day Monday. Freezing rain spreads into and north of Interstate 94 overnight, starting to mix with and then change over to snow by mid to late Monday morning. Snow persists, mostly north of Highway 10 in north-central Wisconsin, through the afternoon with the storm exiting northeast in the evening. Icing up to 1/4" is possible. With winds expected to gust into the mid 30s mph, areas that receive the heavier icing could experience tree damage and power outages. The bulk of the snow accumulations will be confined north of Highway 29 in north-central Wisconsin with a few inches possible. Temperatures will play a key role in what falls where, and how much. Small changes could result in shifts in precipitation types and amounts. Pay close attention to later forecasts for any revisions to what is expected. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO NOON CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Could mix with snow by mid to late Monday morning. Icing up to 2/10 of an inch and snow under an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Trempealeau, Monroe, Juneau and Adams Counties. * WHEN...From 3 AM to noon CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...precipitation starts as freezing rain and could briefly mix with or change over to snow mid to late morning Monday. Transitions to rain for the afternoon. Higher impacts along and north of Interstate 94.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Visit 511wi.gov for road conditions.
